english: I want to look at you

to look for a new job

soundmark: /aɪ/ /æm/ /stɪl/ /ˈlʊkɪŋ/ /fɝ/ /ə/ /nu/ /dʒɑb/ /(I，过去时)be was/ /wəz/ /(过去)正在寻找 was looking for/ /wəz/ /ˈlʊkɪŋ/ /fɝ/

english: but I can't find my keys

english: but I couldn't find my keys

english: you are looking for the person

english: I  am  not  the  person  you  are

english: I heard you were looking for me

english: I  heard  you were  looking  for me, but I was not the person you were looking for
